Correct the info about this message? To do this, MIUI needs to upload the phone number (%1$s), the contents of the message, and the info about nearby location to its servers.

Mi Message allows you to send messages to other MIUI users without incurring charges. An outgoing SMS message is required to activate Mi Message. Your carrier will charge you for this message. You must agree to our \"%1$s\" and \"%2$s\" before using Mi Message.
Messaging needs to use Yellow pages to be able to provide Sender ID recognition. Messaging and Yellow pages need to connect to the internet and access your location to work normally. Allow?
China Mobile Messaging allows you to send messages to other China Mobile users in Mainland China without incurring charges. You must agree to \"%1$s\" before using China Mobile Messaging.

"Your SIM card isn't fully operational with this phone because it doesn't comply with the terms and conditions of your subscription. If you have any questions or need more information about this matter, please contact Xiaomi service centers or the store that sold products to you."

Mi Message allows you to send messages to other Mi Message users over the internet without incurring charges. An outgoing SMS message is required to activate this service. Mi Message lets you send messages to other MIUI users over the internet without incurring charges. An outgoing SMS message may be required to reactivate Mi Message. Mi Message needs to connect to the internet to work normally. CMCC notice: We need to register your device in our device management platform in order to provide free customer services and support. This CMCC platform manages mobile devices and allows you to change settings and upgrade software remotely. A free text message with the information about your device will be sent for registration. The message will only be sent once and will not contain your personal data. This message cannot be sent by customers from Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, and overseas. Select \"OK\" to agree and register your device. Select \"Cancel\" if you disagree with the terms. Services will not be provided to you in this case.
No content found. Send only your signature?
